name: Panther Superhero in Battle
description:
Panther hero stands on guard of good. It's time for all the bandits to hide in their shelters. Because behind them is a real superhero! You are a Panther and at the same time you are a hero who can not run, but fly in the streets of the city. Your superpower will allow you to move with incredible speed creating the feeling that the panther's hero is flying. Enemies will not be able to cope with you, they are not so fast. You are waited by very fascinating history and very abrupt super heroic adventure. Before, you were a resident of Uganda, and now you are saving ordinary people here. People accepted you and called a superhero and you like it. The criminal world will soon find out about the hero from Uganda!

What awaits you in the game Panther Superhero in the Flying Battle:
1. You'll be playing for Panther Hero
2. You will find out how strong a person is from Uganda
3. You will have a great story with a great storyline
4. Opponents with real artificial intelligence
